name: Psycho Ex girlfriend Mayhem
description:
Hey this is my entry for the game jam :) 

this is my first ever game so i am really excited :) 

i am still a beginner 

there a a few areas like a construction site on the roof , classroom  and grass  ( those are the best places you can hide

the controls are WASD and the keys space to jump and make sure you stay away from stacy :) 

she is wearing the pink dress with blonde hair :)

enjoy
